# colombo

This folder contains the GitHub Actions workflows for CI/CD automation in the Colombo project.

## Workflows Overview

- **Continuous Integration (CI):**  
  Automatically runs tests and builds on every push and pull request to ensure code quality.

- **Continuous Deployment (CD):**  
  Deploys the backend and web admin applications to the production VPS on every push to the `main` branch.

- **Release Automation:**  
  Flutter applications are built automatically on new version tags.
